# MTLSparseTextureMappingMode.map

**Case**

A request to map sparse tiles from the heap to a region in the texture.

## Declaration

```swift
case map
```

## Specifying the mapping mode

- **MTLSparseTextureMappingMode.unmap**: A request to remove any mappings for a region in the texture.

items.description: A request to remove any mappings for a region in the texture.
